Bleeding Attack: Sneak attack inflicts 3 HP/rd (magic healing or DC 15 Heal ends)
Deadly Aim: May suffer -3 ranged attack to gain +6 damage
Death Attack: Sneak attack w/melee weapon after 3 rd of study inflicts choice of death or paralysis for 1d6+10 rd (DC 21 Fort neg)
Improved Uncanny Dodge: Cannot be flanked, sneak attack only by rogue level 19+
Quiet Death: May use Stealth to perform Death Attack unnoticed
Sneak Attack: Hit inflicts +8d6 HP when foe is flanked or denied Dexterity bonus
Step Up: May match foe 5' step
Swift Death: May make Death Attack w/out prior study 1/dy
True Death: Raising victim requires DC 20 Remove Curse or DC 25 caster level check
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dexterity modifier to AC (foe feint neg)
Vital Strike: 2x base damage
